timeline.bodyText:
Is this

the time until it will get angry,
the time it will get angry at,
the time it has been angry for, or
the time it will be angry for?

I think the name should make this clear.
timeline.author: Runemoro
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -10,6 +10,7 @@ CLASS net/minecraft/class_1590 net/minecraft/entity/mob/ZombiePigmanEntity
 		ARG 2 spawnType
 		ARG 3 pos
 		ARG 4 random
+	METHOD method_20806 getNewAngerTime ()I

replies.bodyText: The time it will be angry for, hence the New. It generates a new random value for how long a Piglin should be angry after each hit.
replies.author: Shnupbups

replies.bodyText: Then I think getNewAngerDuration would be better.
replies.author: Runemoro

replies.bodyText:

            	METHOD method_20806 getNewAngerTime ()I
          
          
            
            	METHOD method_20806 getNewAngerDuration ()I
replies.author: Juuxel
